Monthly Archives: December 2012

Lonely Roads #102, Aug. 16, 2009, Kitty returns

Posted on December 30, 2012 by mike
Reply

She first appeared back in entry #65 and I’ve finally gotten around to posting her 2nd entry. Been a busy Holiday season for me and I hope Santa was good to each and every one of you. And, if not, Kitty Mal has some presents to share….

Well, for our 2nd shoot I asked Kitty to bare the 100+ degree temps of AZ and also trespass. Yeah, risks! That’s what you get on the Lonely, man. And…fyi….for any of you photographers out there thinking you have to pay $$$ to work with these gals…..THINK AGAIN! If you can create a unique enough picture, offer cool clothing for the gals to keep after the shoot, entertain them with bagel sandwiches and good jokes, and have a theme and purpose prior to working with them….the gals will partake. At least most of ’em, LOL. Even when it’s hot as hell and rules are being compromised!!!

Our trespassing involved sneaking into the construction zone where they were building the Loop 303 freeway out near Surprise, AZ. A little creative off-road driving, opening a necessary fence, and it all seemed pretty easy! And, in preparation for shooting with Kitty, I’d brought along some odd items that I thought might work in that environment: ladder and mop! Hah. I think they work as we balanced Kitty and her curves atop that ladder while wedging the mop up her ass. Oh, yeah, classy creativity on the Lonely Road. And, it actually wasn’t in her rear…just perching there….as if she needed any help drawing a viewer’s eyes to her ass.

We also shot an idea I’d been playing around with for a while: taking a dress and having her slowly cut and tear it off her body…and documenting the whole process. My thought is to make a collage of the shots together….which i’ve not done yet….as I think it would be a neat project. Anyway, you’ll see Kitty make her cuts and I hope you appreciate it! Heck, it’s an old wedding dress I’d been saving for my future bride. Oh, shoot, now what do I do??? ðŸ™‚

You’ll also catch a few shots of my hippy buddy sporting some peace sign gear as well as her dressed in this fuscia skirt and heels that is smokin’ hot and sexy. Kitty’s pouts and expressions are sooooo good, and I think those eyes just make you melt when you see what she’s wearing and how she is posed!

Our last little contribution for this shot is my play on religion….for, Kitty and I were definitely in our own little Garden of Eden that day. Her lustful glances and that tempting flesh of hers worked perfectly for my idea with wooden apples, plastic leaves and a certain rubber snake! I think our version reflects more of an Adam and Evil side of things….butt, you’ll have to be the judge! Anyway….enjoy Kitty Mal and her second visit to the Lonely!

Lonely Road #99, MC, a week ago!

Posted on December 7, 2012 by mike
Reply

Oh, yeah…thought I’d jump ahead about 3 years to the current timeframe, folks, and let you know that IÂ had a wonderful photoshoot last weekendÂ with a beautiful lady who wanted to partake in the Lonely Roads series.

Well, her name is MC….and guess why she wanted to get involved with the Lonely Roads???? Well….she wanted “in” because she checked out this blog you’re reading,Â got a kick out of my energy and style, laughed at some of the videos….and thought the whole notion was pretty unique! Wooo Hooo for me and the Lonely, huh?

Anyway…here’s MC telling you exactly what I just tried to paraphrase:

Saw my blog and wanted to partake

So, MC’s adorable and you’re going to get to see this whole entry and all of her imagesÂ once I “catch-up” and get through about 50 more models, LOL. Oh, and you also may just be lucky enough toÂ seeÂ another video teaser of her this Christmas…as we did shoot a seasonal idea specifically for a Dec. 25 entry. Yeah, MC! Anyway, the Lonely Road continues with stunning gals likeÂ her……. and I was just stoked to share with you, inÂ her own perspective, what my blog is all about!

Take care…..
